sen.j: 東映京都撮影所（とうえい きょうと さつえいじょ）は、京都市右京区太秦に存在する映画スタジオである。
sen.e: The Toei Kyoto Movie Studio is located in Uzumasa, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The Toei Kyoto Movie Studio is located in Uzumasa, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
The Toei Kyoto Movie Studio is located in Uzumasa, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 日本映画製作者連盟加盟のメジャー映画会社である東映の一事業所である。
sen.e: The studio is owned by a major movie production company called Toei, a member of Motion Picture Producers Association of Japan, Inc.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The studio is owned by a major movie production company called Toei, a member of Motion Picture Producers Association of Japan, Inc.
The studio is owned by a major movie production company called Toei, a member of Motion Picture Producers Association of Japan, Inc.

sen.j: 現在はその敷地内に、オープンセットを一般公開するテーマパークである東映太秦映画村や、関連の各企業を内包する。
sen.e: The site is currently home to Toei business offices and Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura (Toei Movie Land), an amusement park with Toei movies sets open to general public.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The site is currently home to Toei business offices and Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura (Toei Movie Land), an amusement park with Toei movies sets open to general public.
The site is currently home to Toei business offices and Kyoto Uzumasa Eigamura (Toei Movie Land), an amusement park with Toei movies sets open to general public.

sen.j: 東映となってからは50数年であるが、撮影所自体は、大正末年に阪東妻三郎が同地を切り開いて以来、80年を超える歴史を有する。
sen.e: It has only been little over 50 years since the it became Toei; however, the studio itself was opened over 80 years ago in 1926 by Tsumasaburo Bando.
It has only been a little over 50 years since it became Toei; however, the studio itself was opened over 80 years ago in 1926 by Tsumasaburo Bando.
It has only been a little over 50 years since it became Toei; however, the studio itself was opened over 80 years ago in 1926 by Tsumasaburo Bando.

sen.j: 名称 東映株式会社京都撮影所
sen.e: Name: Toei Company Ltd., Kyoto Movie Studio
Name: Toei Company Ltd., Kyoto Movie Studio
Name: Toei Company Ltd., Kyoto Movie Studio

sen.j: 所在地 京都府京都市右京区太秦西蜂岡町9
sen.e: Location: 9, Uzumasanishimachioka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
Location: 9, Uzumasanishimachioka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
Location: 9, Uzumasanishihachioka-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture

tit.e: Events Leading up to its Establishment
Events Leading up to its Establishment
Events leading up to its establishment

sen.j: 1925年（大正14年）5月2日、竹薮だった太秦の地を切り開き、阪東妻三郎プロダクションが自社の撮影所を建設した。
sen.e: On May 2, 1925, Tsumasaburo BANDO Productions created its own movie studio after clearing a bamboo grove,
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On May 2, 1925, Tsumasaburo BANDO Productions created its own movie studio after clearing a bamboo grove,
On May 2, 1925, Tsumasaburo BANDO Productions created its own movie studio after clearing a bamboo grove,

sen.j: 「合資会社一立商店阪東妻三郎プロダクション太秦撮影所」としてオープン、太秦地区の初めての撮影所となった。
sen.e: "The Uzumasa Movie Studio of Tsumasaburo BANDO Production of Ichiritsu & Company, Ltd." became the first movie studio in the Uzumasa district.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: "The Uzumasa Movie Studio of Tsumasaburo BANDO Production of Ichiritsu & Company, Ltd." became the first movie studio in the Uzumasa district.
The Uzumasa Movie Studio of Tsumasaburo BANDO Production of Ichiritsu & Company, Ltd.' became the first movie studio in the Uzumasa district.

sen.j: 同年12月末には、同プロダクションは株式会社に組織変更する。
sen.e: At the end of December of the same year, the company went public.
At the end of December of the same year, the company went public.
At the end of December of the same year, the company went public.

sen.j: 1930年（昭和5年）、同撮影所は松竹に譲渡され、当時松竹傘下となっていた帝国キネマが使用し、「帝国キネマ太秦撮影所」となる。
sen.e: In 1930, ownership of the studio shifted to Shochiku, and the studio was used by Teikoku Kinema (Imperial Cinema Entertainment Co. Ltd.), an affiliate of Shochiku, and the name of the studio was changed to Teikoku Kinema Uzumasa Movie Studio.

In 1930, ownership of the studio shifted to Shochiku, and the studio was used by Teikoku Kinema (Imperial Cinema Entertainment Co. Ltd.), an affiliate of Shochiku, and the name of the studio was changed to Teikoku Kinema Uzumasa Movie Studio.

In 1930, ownership of the studio shifted to Shochiku, and the studio was used by Teikoku Kinema (Imperial Cinema Entertainment Co. Ltd.), an affiliate of Shochiku, and the name of the studio was changed to Teikoku Kinema Uzumasa Movie Studio.

sen.j: 1931年（昭和6年）、帝国キネマが改組され、新興キネマが設立されると同時に、同撮影所は「新興キネマ京都太秦撮影所」となる。
sen.e: In 1931, Teikoku Kinema was reorganized, and with the establishment of Shinko Kinema, the studio was renamed New Kinema Kyoto Studio.
In 1931, Teikoku Kinema was reorganized, and with the establishment of Shinko Kinema, the studio was renamed New Kinema Kyoto Studio.
In 1931, Teikoku Kinema was reorganized, and with the establishment of Shinko Kinema, the studio was renamed New Kinema Kyoto Studio.

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）1月、新興キネマ、大都映画、日活の製作部門の合併により、大映が設立されると同時に、同撮影所は「大映第二撮影所」となる。
sen.e: In 1942, the merger of Shinko Kinema, Daito Eiga and Nikkatsu's production division, established a new company, Daiei, and the studio became Daiei No.2 Studio.
In 1942, the merger of Shinko Kinema, Daito Eiga and Nikkatsu's production division, established a new company, Daiei, and the studio became Daiei No.2 Studio.
In January 1942, the merger of Shinko Kinema, Daito Eiga and Nikkatsu's production division, established a new company, Daiei, and the studio became Daiei No. 2 Studio.

sen.j: 1947年（昭和22年）、東横映画発足、同社の撮影所となる。
sen.e: In 1947, Toyoko Film Company was established and the studio became the property of the company.
In 1947, Toyoko Film Company was established and the studio became the property of the company.
In 1947, Toyoko Film Company was established and the studio became the property of the company.

sen.j: 1951年（昭和26年）4月1日、東横映画、太泉映画、東京映画配給の3社が合併して、東映を設立した。
sen.e: On April 1, 1951, Toyoko Film Company, Oizumi Films and Tokyo Film Distribution Company merged to establish Toei.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On April 1, 1951, Toyoko Film Company, Oizumi Films and Tokyo Film Distribution Company merged to establish Toei.
On April 1, 1951, Toyoko Film Company, Oizumi Films and Tokyo Film Distribution Company merged to establish Toei.

sen.j: 東横映画撮影所は「東映京都撮影所」に、太泉映画スタジオは「東映東京撮影所」に、東京映画配給の配給・興行の機構は、本社および支社、直営館として東映を構成した。
sen.e: Toyoko Movie Studio became the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio and the Uzumasa Movie Studio became the Toei Tokyo Movie Studio, and the distribution and box office operation of the Tokyo Film Distribution Company was reorganized as Toei Company, Ltd. with head office, branch office and direct managed movie theaters.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Toyoko Movie Studio became the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio and the Uzumasa Movie Studio became the Toei Tokyo Movie Studio, and the distribution and box office operation of the Tokyo Film Distribution Company was reorganized as Toei Company, Ltd. with head office, branch office and direct managed movie theaters.

Toyoko Movie Studio became the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio and the Uzumasa Movie Studio became the Toei Tokyo Movie Studio, and the distribution and box office operation of the Tokyo Film Distribution Company was reorganized as Toei Company, Ltd. with head office, branch office and direct managed movie theaters.

tit.j: 東映のスタジオとして

sen.j: 1951年の「東映京都撮影所」としての開所以来、多くの傑作を生み出した。
sen.e: Since the opening of the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio in 1951, many great movies has been filmed there.
Since the opening of the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio in 1951, many great movies has been filmed there.
Since the opening of the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio in 1951, many great movies has been filmed there.

sen.j: 土地柄とその伝統から、おもに時代劇を得意としているが、現代劇のテレビドラマ等も製作している。
sen.e: Because of its location and past history, the majority of movies filmed in the studio are historical in nature, and many of historical TV dramas are also filmed there.
Because of its location and past history, the majority of movies filmed in the studio are historical in nature, and many of historical TV dramas are also filmed there.
Because of its location and past history, the majority of movies filmed in the studio are historical in nature, and many of contemporary TV dramas are also filmed there.

sen.j: おもに時代劇のテレビ映画を受注製作する東映太秦映像、テーマパーク「東映太秦映画村」を経営する東映京都スタジオは東映子会社であるが、別会社である。
sen.e: Toei Uzumasa Films, that produces historical TV movies, and the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio, that manages Toei Uzumasa Eigamura (Toei Movie Land), are affiliates of Toei Company, but under independent management.

Toei Uzumasa Films, that produces historical TV movies, and the Toei Kyoto Movie Studio, that manages Toei Uzumasa Eigamura (Toei Movie Land), are affiliates of Toei Company, but under independent management.
